page.title: 11Organising this service
page.content: Wirral Social Services Dept. gave the money to buy recording equipment. But the running cost is about Â£3800 per year which must be raised themselves. They collect the money by sponsored walks ,reads and spells. People help because they may know someone who is blind. Besides the news items there is a part of the tape used for a magazine of advertisements . The editor get tapes delivered to the blind by putting them in yellow packets and taking them to the main Post Office. When tapes are returned by blind people,they are checked.If any have an elastic band on it means a message is on it commenting on the tape quality or with suggestions. All the technicians, readers and the editors are volunteers. We thought it was a great sevice.
